subject: Top listed drugs for you
body:
Dear valued member.
With this letter we are presenting you one of the most popular Canadian on-line drug stores. MyCanadianPharmacy is known for providing quality products at ultra low prices. 
We provide high quality products meeting all Pharmaceutical Standards at really low prices. Order from MyCanadianPharmacy and receive discounts.You have no need now to buy expensive American pharmaceutical products.
Check it out nowhttp://spreadown.hk
Personal approach, high security level, fast and efficient service.Spring discounts are available.
Best regards,Deidre Mcdonough
